plugin.name: Cloud Foundry Maven Plugin
plugin.description: A Maven plugin that makes it easy to deploy Maven-based applications to Cloud Foundry instances.

mojo.description: Performs logout and removes the target info from ~/.cf/tokens.yml.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip any and all execution of this plugin.

mojo.description: Restarts an application.

parameter.name: appStartupTimeout
parameter.description: The app startup timeout to use for the application.

parameter.name: artifact
parameter.description: A string of the form groupId:artifactId:version:packaging[:classifier].

parameter.name: buildpack
parameter.description: The buildpack to use for the application.

parameter.name: command
parameter.description: The start command to use for the application.

parameter.name: diskQuota
parameter.description: Set the disk quota for the application

parameter.name: domains
parameter.description: list of domains to use by the application.

parameter.name: env
parameter.description: Environment variables

parameter.name: healthCheckTimeout
parameter.description: The health check timeout to use for the application.

parameter.name: instances
parameter.description: Set the expected number <N> of instances

parameter.name: memory
parameter.description: Set the memory reservation for the application

parameter.name: mergeEnv
parameter.description: Merge existing env vars when updating the application

parameter.name: noStart
parameter.description: Do not auto-start the application

parameter.name: path
parameter.description:
The path of one of the following:
  • War file to deploy
  • Zip or Jar file to deploy
  • Exploded War directory
  • Directory containing a stand-alone application to deploy

parameter.name: services
parameter.description: list of services to use by the application.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip any and all execution of this plugin.

parameter.name: stack
parameter.description: The stack to use for the application.
